title: Define environment variables for the QGIS Deployment CLI execution. Attention, no confusion: these are the settings for the toolbelt, not for the QGIS installation.

DEBUG.description: Enable debug mode. Make the execution more verbose but quite slower too.
DEBUG.title: Debug mode

SCENARIO_VALIDATION.description: Enable scenario validation. This will check the scenario against the JSON schema.
SCENARIO_VALIDATION.title: Scenario validation

OFFLINE_MODE.description: If set to true, the QGIS Deployment CLI will not try to connect to the QGIS Server.
OFFLINE_MODE.title: Offline mode

SSL_VERIFICATION.description: If set to true, the SSL certificate of remote servers will verified. If you disable it, you assume a lower security.
SSL_VERIFICATION.title: SSL verification

HTTP_PROXY.markdownDescription:
HTTP proxy to use for network requests. Can be:
- HTTP: 'http://user:pass@ip.pr.ox.y:port/'
- SOCKS: 'socks5://user:pass@host:port'
HTTP_PROXY.title: Proxy URL for HTTP

HTTPS_PROXY.description: Same as HTTP_PROXY bu for HTTPS.
HTTPS_PROXY.title: Proxy URL for HTTPS

FIXTURES_DIR.description: Folder to look for specific tests fixtures. Only for development purposes.
FIXTURES_DIR.title: Development tests fixtures directory

SYNCHRONOUS_MODE.description: Enable or disable single processing mode. Enable it only if you're facing multiprocessing issues.
SYNCHRONOUS_MODE.title: Synchronous mode
